# Lucille Lortel Award for Outstanding Sound Design

| location = United States
| holder = Fabian Obispo, Sumo (2025)
| website =
}}
The Lucille Lortel Award for Outstanding Sound Design is an award presented annually at the Lucille Lortel Awards to honor excellence in sound design for an Off-Broadway musical or play production since 2001.
Mikhail Fiksel holds the record for the most wins in the category, with three wins, along with the most nominations, netting seven. Close behind in nominations is Matt Tierney with five.
